Question
========

In a regression analysis with the variables y and x, if the directional coefficient b = 1, then (i) the correlation between y and x equals r = 1 and (ii) the intercept equals a = 0.

Answerlist
----------

* (i) is true and (ii) is false.
* (i) is incorrect and (ii) is correct.
* (i) and (ii) are both incorrect.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* (i) is correct and (ii) is incorrect: Incorrect
* (i) is incorrect and (ii) is true...: Incorrect
* (i) and (ii) are both incorrect: Correct
